bibl.title: The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire

bibl.seg: YATROMANOLAKIS Dimitrios, To Sing or to Mourn? A Reappraisal of Simonides 22 W2.

An earlier version of this paper appeared as: Simonides fr. eleg. 22 W2: To Sing or to Mourn?, ZPE 120 (1998) pp. 1-11. - I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 22. - Pp. 220-225: Postscript. Observations about Mace's contribution (ibidem, pp. 158-207).
